page.title: 10POPULATION OF DELABOLE
page.content: Delabole is a Cornish slate- quarrying village with a population of 1,100 people. A recent survey of the village showed that there were as many old-age pensioners in the village as there are school children. There are two main reasons for this: many of the young people move out of Delabole to find jobs and many of the old people moved to Delabole when they retired. Apart from this the population is a stable one.Out of 72 children who completed a survey 53 have lived in Delabole all their lives .Most of these are Cornish children and many have parents born & bred in Delabole.
